PROJECT(googletest)

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

SET(GOOGLETEST_MAJOR_VERSION 1)
SET(GOOGLETEST_MINOR_VERSION 8)
SET(GOOGLETEST_PATCH_VERSION 0)
SET(GOOGLETEST_VERSION ${GOOGLETEST_MAJOR_VERSION}.${GOOGLETEST_MINOR_VERSION}.${GOOGLETEST_PATCH_VERSION})

SET(GOOGLETEST_PROJECT_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
SET(KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR "${GOOGLETEST_PROJECT_DIR}/../..")

INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/CMake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/CMake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/CMake/Compiler.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Build/CMake/ExternalCommon.cmake)

SET_PROPERTY(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

SET(GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR "${GOOGLETEST_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(KLAYGE_BIN_DIR "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/KlayGE/bin/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(REL_PATH "External/Downloads/googletest-${GOOGLETEST_VERSION}.7z")
SET(SEVENZIP_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_HOST_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z")
SET(PACKAGE_FILE_ID "bd5d9390d9855ad0decd28bce87813e20643cfef")

DOWNLOAD_PACKAGE("googletest" ${REL_PATH} ${PACKAGE_FILE_ID})

OPTION(gtest_disable_pthreads "" ON)
OPTION(gtest_force_shared_crt "" ON)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${GOOGLETEST_PROJECT_DIR} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/googletest")

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(gtest PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	OUTPUT_NAME gtest${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(gtest_main PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	OUTPUT_NAME gtest_main${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)
